effect.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
effect.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 30 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque côté face.
effect.es: Lanza 2 monedas. Este ataque hace 30 puntos de daño más por cada cara.
effect.it: Lancia due volte una moneta. Questo attacco infligge 30 danni in più ogni volta che esce testa.
effect.pt: Jogue 2 moedas. Este ataque causa 30 pontos de dano a mais para cada cara.
effect.de: Wirf 2 Münzen. Diese Attacke fügt 30 Schadenspunkte mehr pro Kopf zu.

description.en: It moves through the sands with its mouth open, swallowing sand along with its prey. It gets rid of the sand by spouting it from its nose.
